name: Your Life is Collecting Really Nice Cats!
name_original: Your Life is Collecting Really Nice Cats!
description:
Left and right arrows for movement, shift to pick up/hurl a kitty, and space bar to jump!

Gertrude must collect all 20 cats in her trailer before time runs out to win. Watch out for the naughty children, they'll knock her over and slap any cat she's carrying out of her arms!

This old trailer is full of holes, so you can conveniently toss the cats inside through the roof!
